page.title: 03Longmorn Distillery.
page.content: Longmorn Distillery is 91 years old. The owner of Longmorn Distillery also owns the Queen Anne Distillery. The Distillery works all day and the workers are organised into 3 shifts. One shift goes to work at 6am and finishes at 2pm. The next shift goes on at 2pm and finishes at 10pm. The last shift starts at 10pm and finishes at 6am. The distillery workers get 1 day off every 7 weeks. The workers get 4 weeks off in summer. In total there are 31 people who work at this distillery. Since the 1970s 10 people have been employed in making whisky as the demand for whisky has declined. This is because wine can be produced cheaply by many of the EEC countries. Many people have stopped drinking whisky and now enjoy wine.
